name: Unconventional Warfare (PyxelRez)
description:
Created in less than 72 hours for the GMC Jam. Unconventional Warfare is heavily inspired from nuclear throne, and recreates the fast-pace top-down shooter gameplay. With several weapons to collect and enemies of all sorts, battle your way through the Dojo and save your mother.

WASD to move

Mouse controls to shoot

Press 'L' if game is lagging, that will turn off the lighting ;)
